pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, December 14, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, December 14, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus Meeting.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Liberal Caucus Holiday Party.

Shaw Centre
55 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks only
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:15 p.m.
  • Media should present themselves to Room 103
